description:
Merged Zamasu’s immortality is limited! Vegeta and Goku ask the Supreme Kais for help. Will their combined strength prevail over such a significant threat? Is this the chance for Future Trunks to get his revenge?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Entscheidungskampf! - Die wunderbare Kraft der Unbeugsamen!
Kessen! Akiramenai Senshi-tachi no Kiseki no Power
The Climactic Battle! The Miraculous Power of a Relentless Warrior!
決戦! あきらめない戦士たちの奇跡の力[パワー]
